title: How to send in a ticket at XARIS for Hardware support
text: Send a mail to klant@xaris.nl using the XARIS MAIL template and follow intructions in this mail template. See attachment. Be sure you delet all RED text.
description:
Send a mail to klant@xaris.nl using the XARIS MAIL template and follow intructions in this mail template.

See attachment.


Be sure you delet all RED text.
